title: 30: OBITCH get in the boat we're going to hell...
description:
Ahoy Geoff’s! This week we’re starting 2022 off right with a game of head, shoulders, knees, and toes with Madison, and then Spencer is getting superstitious with some bizarre traditions from around ze world. We’ve got some Geoff-submitted obituaries, and a fun twist for our dumb.ass.criminallllllls, let’s do this! 
Follow along online:  instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us:  obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors:
Better Help: Visit betterhelp.com/obit for 10% off your first month! Hello Fresh: Visit hellofresh.com/obit16 for up to 16 free meals + 3 free gifts!  Raycon: Visit buyraycon.com/obit to save 15% off! 
Sources: 
 https://www.communitynews.org/towns/princeton-echo/einstein-s-brain-has-a-history-all-its-own/article_248b65da-f6e0-5043-a5c2-c8c1aee6557e.html http://eyewitnesstohistory.com/matahari.htm https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mata_Hari https://www.msn.com/en-us/travel/news/famous-body-parts-that-werent-buried-with-their-owners/ss-AAQgu3t#image=4  https://lincolnconspirators.com/2014/06/27/john-wilkes-booths-vertebrae/https://www.huffpost.com/entry/thirteen-strange-supersti_b_8997856 https://www.joincake.com/blog/covering-mirrors-after-death/ https://exemplore.com/legends/Stopping-Clocks-And-Covering-Mirrors-When-A-Person-Dies-Like-In-the-Movie-Fried-Green-Tomatoes https://www.joincake.com/blog/charons-obol/ https://www.rogerjnorton.com/Lincoln83.html https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/63428/10-people-whose-hearts-were-buried-separately-rest-them https://shannonselin.com/2017/05/napoleons-body/ https://www.livescience.com/63973-photos-famous-people-body-parts.html https://shannonselin.com/2017/05/napoleons-body/ https://www.oddee.com/the-strange-200-year-journey-of-napoleons-penis-59405/ https://www.wtxl.com/news/florida-woman-arrested-for-throwing-knife-after-man-ate-her/article_9eceee47-559e-55a0-8cdd-85cd36c255f4.html https://www.ozarksfirst.com/local-news/florida-woman-sentenced-after-pulling-alligator-from-her-pants-during-traffic-stop-officials/
